updates.title: Intro to Smart Publishing Workshop
updates.description: Discover the essentials of launching your book with our Smart Publishing Webinar. Learn how to build an author platform, engage readers, and navigate the publishing process with confidence. Securing the right partnerships

The Smart Publishing Guide for Authors provides a focused, strategic approach to the often-overlooked pre-launch phase, helping authors build a strong foundation for a successful book launch through platform building, audience engagement, and securing valuable partnership.
